data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: My brother is an amateur radio operator who took his licensing exam last year. He ____ other ____ use ____ parts ____ the ____ frequency ____ to ____, ____ messages, and ____ new ____. His ____ is ____ use ____ transmission ____ most ____. However, he has also become practiced in Morse code to transmit signals when conditions make a signal harder to detect.
data.partBlankContent: My brother is an amateur radio operator who took his licensing exam last year. He a__ other hobb_____ use cer____ parts o_ the ra___ frequency spec____ to ch__, exch____ messages, and me__ new peo___. His prefe_____ is t_ use vo___ transmission f__ most mess____. However, he has also become practiced in Morse code to transmit signals when conditions make a signal harder to detect.
data.answer: 我哥哥是一名业余无线电操作员，去年参加了执照考试。他和其他爱好者使用无线电频谱的某些部分来聊天、交换信息和结识新朋友。他倾向于对大多数消息使用语音传输。然而，他也熟练使用莫尔斯电码来传输信号，当条件使信号难以探测时。
